titles.title: Blocking the Entry of Malign Actors Act
Blocking the Entry of Malign Actors Act

To amend the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1990 and 1991 to expand the President's authority to deny any individual's admission to the United States as a representative to the United Nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Blocking the Entry of Malign Actors Act
This bill requires the President to deny an individual's admission to the United States as a representative to the United Nations if the individual (1) engaged in espionage or terrorist activities against the United States or its allies, or (2) may pose a threat to U.S. national security interests. Currently, such a denial is only required if the individual meets both criteria.
